to.sven.androidrccar.common.framework

Class AbstractDependencyContainer<TFactory extends IFactory,TListener extends ILogicListener>

  • java.lang.Object
    • to.sven.androidrccar.common.framework.AbstractDependencyContainer<TFactory,TListener>
  • Type Parameters:
    TFactory - The interface of the concrete IFactory
    TListener - The interface of the concrete ILogicListener.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDependencyContainer<TFactory,TListener>

    public abstract class AbstractDependencyContainer<TFactory extends IFactory,TListener extends ILogicListener>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDependencyContainer<TFactory,TListener>
    The IDependencyContainer contains all dependences for the AbstractLogic and it's dependences.
    Author:
    sven

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Context context
      Contains the Context of the application.
      private TFactory factory
      A factory for object creation.
      private Handler handler
      A Handler associated with the applications main thread (the one with the activities).
      private TListener listener
      A listener for the Logic.
      private ILocationService locationService
      If set, it contains the ILocationService.
      private java.net.Socket socket
      The connection to the Client/Host.
